# Java

```java

import java.util.Scanner;

public class Main14889 {
	static int n;
	static int[][] map;
	static int ans = Integer.MAX_VALUE;
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
		n = sc.nextInt();
		map = new int[n][n];
		
		for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
			for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
				map[i][j] = sc.nextInt();
			}
		}
		
		go(0,0,"");
		System.out.println(ans);
	}
	private static void go(int idx1, int idx2, String s) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		if(idx1+idx2 == n) {
//			System.out.println(s);
			int[] arr1 = new int[n/2];
			int[] arr2 = new int[n/2];
			int tempIdx1=0,tempIdx2=0;
			for (int i = 0; i < s.length(); i++) {
				int num = s.charAt(i)-'0';
				
				if(num ==1) {
					arr1[tempIdx1++] = i;
				}else {
					arr2[tempIdx2++] = i;
				}
				
			}
			
			int ans_temp1=0,ans_temp2=0,ans_temp=0;
			
			for (int i = 0; i < n/2; i++) {
				for (int j = 0; j < n/2; j++) {
					ans_temp1+= map[arr1[i]][arr1[j]];
					ans_temp2+= map[arr2[i]][arr2[j]];
				}
			}
			
			ans_temp = Math.abs(ans_temp1-ans_temp2);
			
			if(ans > ans_temp) {
				ans = ans_temp;
			}
			
			return;
		}
		
		if(idx1<n/2) {
			go(idx1+1,idx2,s+"1");
		}
		
		if(idx2<n/2) {
			go(idx1,idx2+1,s+"2");
		}
		
	}

}


```
